newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Walker Corp sees improved 96/97 profit.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Walker Corp sees improved 96/97 profit.

text.p: Property developer Walker Corp Ltd said on Friday it saw prospects for an improved profit in its 1996/97 financial year.

"The company has experienced a difficult year and whilst confidence about economic recovery is not particularly high, we feel that next year will provide improved trading conditions for Walker with propects of an improved profit," the company said.

Earlier, Walker said its net profit fot the year to June 30, 1996 had fallen by 61.8 percent to A$10.03 million from A$26.28 million the previous year. The company cut its final dividend to 1.1 cents a share from three cents a share.

"The company faces the coming year with some confidence. Business and domestic conditions have not recovered as might have been expected following the Federal election in March, however, recent signs, including the drop in interest rates, have been quite promising," Walker said.
At 12.45 p.m. (0245 GMT), Walker shares were one cent weaker at 47.5 cents. -- Sydney newsroom 61-2 373-1800
